name: Minor Miner
description:
Story:

You are a simple Miner who got stuck at the bottom of his mine with only one way to get back to the surface

Up

Gameplay:

Gather as many resources as you can on your back home, and avoid the deadly spikes that block your path. Maybe you'll even make some new friends along the way

Controls:

Space to jump from side to side

W to throw your pickaxe

R to reset the run

Info:

This game and everything in it was made by me, LukeDaDuke
